author: Josh Margolin
title: FBI warns of potential surge in hate crimes against Asian Americans amid coronavirus
description: FBI warns of a potential surge in hate crimes against Asian Americans amid the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Federal law enforcement is warning of an increase in hate crimes against Asian Americans as the coronavirus crisis continues to grow, according to a new FBI analysis obtained by ABC News.
"The FBI assesses hate crime incidents against Asian Americans likely … [+3597 chars]
